content.heading: Job
content.description: John Hewitt takes us on a deep dive of Praying Our Tears and the lessons we learn through the book of Job

content.heading: 2nd Samuel
content.description: Continuing through the same theme of cultivating a devotional relationship with God, we take a look at the Book of 2nd Samuel presented by Gareth McMeekin

content.heading: 1st Samuel
content.description: Our focus was on characters, looking at an emphasis on cultivation of the devotional relationship with God as well as the ideas of sacrifice and service in 1 Samuel through various speakers

content.heading: Overview of Revelation
content.description: Looking at our future hope and promise, we explored the book of Revelations displayed to us by Stevie Rogers from Apsley Hall as our speaker

content.heading: Isaiah
content.description: Continuing on the theme of prophecy in the Bible, we were led through the book of Isaiah with Allan McKinnon from Tilsley College

content.heading: Introduction to Prophecy
content.description: "An Introduction to Bible Prophecy" with a focus on the book of Jonah

content.heading: Gospel of John
content.description: Josh Fitzhugh from Belfast took us through the Gospel of John for the first gathering after lockdown
